original_text: They roasted the Passover animals over the fire as prescribed, and boiled the holy offerings in pots, caldrons and pans and served them quickly to all the people.
korean_text: 이에 규례대로 유월절 양을 불에 굽고 그 나머지 성물은 솥과 가마와 냄비에 삶아 모든 백성들에게 속히 분배하고

sentences.original_text: They roasted the Passover animals over the fire
and boiled the holy offerings in pots
and served them quickly to all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 모든 백성에게 빠르게 제공했다
